com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.gantt

Class Spreadsheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dlsc.flexgantt.model.gantt.Spreadsheet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISpreadsheet

    public class Spreadsheet
extends Object
implements ISpreadsheet
    A model object used to define a spreadsheet that can be made visible inside the Gantt chart.
    Since:
    2.1
    Author:
    Dirk Lemmermann
    See Also:
    IGanttChartModel.getSpreadsheets(), AbstractGanttChart.setActiveSpreadsheet(ISpreadsheet)

      Returns the time granularity used by the spreadsheet, e.g.
      String getName()
      The name of the spreadsheet as it will be shown in the UI components that control the visibility of the spreadsheets.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Spreadsheet

        public Spreadsheet(String name,
                   IGranularity<?> granularity,
                   int cellWidth,
                   Class defaultValueType)
        Constructs a new spreadsheet.
        Parameters:
        name - the name as shown in the user interface
        granularity - the time granularity that will be shown by the dateline
        cellWidth - the width used for the cells in the spreadsheet
        defaultValueType - the default type used for editing new spreadsheet values
        Since:
        2.1

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Description copied from interface: ISpreadsheet
        The name of the spreadsheet as it will be shown in the UI components that control the visibility of the spreadsheets.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface ISpreadsheet
        Returns:
        the spreadsheet name.

      • getGranularity

        public IGranularity<?> getGranularity()
        Description copied from interface: ISpreadsheet
        Returns the time granularity used by the spreadsheet, e.g. DAYS.
        Specified by:
        getGranularity in interface ISpreadsheet
        Returns:
        the time granularity used by the spreadsheet. Each cell represents this granularity.

      • getCellWidth

        public int getCellWidth()
        Description copied from interface: ISpreadsheet
        The required width of the spreadsheet cells. All cells have the same width. The width will be applied to the granularity shown in the dateline.
        Specified by:
        getCellWidth in interface ISpreadsheet
        Returns:
        the width of each cell in a spreadsheet

      • getDefaultValueType

        public Class getDefaultValueType()
        Description copied from interface: ISpreadsheet
        Returns the default object type of the spreadsheet's cell values, where a cell is defined by its tree node, the spreadsheet itself, and a time span. The default value type is required when a SpreadsheetLayer tries to lookup an editor for a specific spreadsheet cell and the cell does not have a value, yet. If a value exists, then the value's type will be used to lookup an editor.
        Specified by:
        getDefaultValueType in interface ISpreadsheet
        Returns:
        the default type of the cell values
